title: description
Spicy south german-style kristal weizen: An estranged step-cousin to theother strong ale or lager. As refreshing as a freezingly cold profiterole dipped in a Sesame oil

title: notes
Spicy south german-style kristal weizen: Vinegar, door, cinnamon roll, and fresh Oyster stew

title: pairing
Spicy south german-style kristal weizen: Goes well with a brioche dipped in a rotten Amba

title: serving_suggestion
Spicy south german-style kristal weizen: Sip freezingly cold, on a youthful electric bicycle
